name: fd-miniprojekt-finnge
description: Projektprüfung im Kurs "Frontend Development" des Schwerpunktmoduls Web-Development im Studiengang Medieninformatik (Ba.) an der TH Köln (SS 2020)

scripts.dev:css: node-sass --source-map true src/assets/styles/scss src/styles/scss/main.scss -o src/assets/styles/ --output-style compressed
scripts.watch:sass: node-sass --source-map true --watch src/assets/styles/scss src/styles/scss/main.scss -o src/assets/styles/ --output-style compressed

author: Finn Nils Gedrath
